title: Fansidar 25/500MG Tab 15x10 (L)
details:
The fansidar, which is used to treat malaria, recently becomes commercially available around the world. After numerous research and inquiries, it has become evident that this drug is effective against malaria. This fansidar tablet is not chewed b

READ MORE
precautions: The danger of malaria must be carefully evaluated against the potential of major medication side effects.The danger of malaria must be carefully evaluated against the potential of major medication side effects.If Fansidar is recommended for prophylaxis, it is critical that the doctor asks about sulfonamide intolerance and emphasizes the risk of skin responses and the necessity for prompt drug withdrawal if they occur.Plasma dyscrasias, acute hepatic or renal illness (kidney disorders) (blood disease).Among patients who are sensitive to sulphonamides, this drug should be avoided.The very first tablet of Fansidar (pyrimethamine and sulfadoxine) should be taken about 1 or 2 days before arriving in an endemic area; administration must be continued while the stay and up to 4 or 5 weeks after return.Other antimalarial medicines, chloroquine, and sulfa drugs are reported to interact with Fansidar. Speak to your doctor about all of your drugs and supplements. If you are expecting or plan to get pregnant while taking Fansidar, notify your doctor right away since it can harm a fetus. Malaria has a higher risk of killing a pregnant lady. Fansidar should not be used while breastfeeding.Visit your physician and talk about the hazards of traveling to locations where malaria is prevalent if you are pregnant.Use with caution if you have severe kidney or liver problems or certain blood problems. Do not use if you are allergic to pyrimethamine or any other ingredient in pyrimethamine/sulfadoxine. Avoid prolong sun exposure. It can interact with L-methyl folate, folic acid, phenytoin, prometazine.
effects: As fansidar is an anti-parasitic drug which can cure malaria, it contains sulfadoxine and pyrimethamine, which can cause allergies to some people. So below are listed some common side effects that may be caused as a result of being allergic to these two compounds.Talk to your health care if you experience any kind of side effects from Fansidar.It may include a mild blistering or peeling, or red skin rashIf skin starts becoming pale or may start bleeding.If you experience hallucinations or you feel weak, tired, or dizzy.If urinating, not at all or less than usual.Yellowing of eyes or skin. Stomach pain has been reported very rarely, but it can be resulted as a side effect.Ringing in your ears is also reported as a side effect of fansidar dosage.You can also experience Jaundice, shortness of breath. Cough, cold, joint pain, swollen tongue, sore through, dryness of mouth, fever, and chills as a side effect of taking fansidar tablet.Other side effects that are rarely reported are sleep problems (insomnia), diarrhea, dizziness, hair loss, headache, muscle weakness, depression, nervousness, nausea, or loss of appetite.
